item.title: Zeroth-Order Sampling Methods for Non-Log-Concave Distributions: Alleviating Metastability by Denoising Diffusion
item.description: Zeroth-Order Diffusion Monte Carlo (ZOD-MC) efficiently samples from non-log-concave distributions using only zeroth-order queries, overcoming metastability issues and outperforming state-of-the-art s…
